resources.title: Microsoft Certification Path PDF
resources.description: For a comprehensive look at all Microsoft Certification paths, download our PDF guide here.

resources.title: Microsoft Certification Roadmap
resources.description: Get hired, demonstrate clear business impact, and advance your skills. Microsoft offers a wide range of online certification programs designed to take your career to the next level.

resources.title: Exam Policies & FAQ
resources.description: Around the world, partners and customers look to Microsoft to deliver the highest quality exams and certifications. The Microsoft Certification exam policies have been developed to support the goals of the certification program.
